string.value: You passed all of #p2101003#'s test, so he will accept you as a member of the Sand Banditsâ€¦right? Better go talk to #p2101003#.

#p2101003# tells you the Sand Bandits need to get stronger to fight the queen, and says if you beat him, he'll accept you as a member of the Sand Bandits. Will you be able to defeat #p2101003#? \n\nArdin's Other Self#r#a39331##k

He may look slow and clumsy, but #p2101003# was much more powerful that you had envisioned. You won anyway, though. #p2101003# said you now have to gain the acceptance of the other Sand Bandits. Come to think of it, the #p2103001# also mentioned a bow, arrows, and a dagger.

Wow! I don't think I've had that much fun battling in a long time. To battle the queen, who's overly zealous and uses weird spells, we need to place her against a very formidable foe. Someone as powerful as you is definitely useful for the Sand Bandits.

That doesn't mean you're a member just yet. You may have passed my test, but you still haven't taken all the tests required to join the Sand Bandits. You'll need to find other members and pass their tests, too. Personally, I hope you become one of us.
If you beat me in a battle, then I'll accept you.
